title: Planet Serpo - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/3/19
itunes:title: Planet Serpo - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/3/19
description:
George Noory and author Len Kasten discuss his research into an exchange program that allegedly sent human astronauts to Planet Serpo to interact with an advanced alien race, and that Steven Spielberg's classic film "Close Encounters of the Third Kind" was made using secret government information to cover up the project.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:summary: An investigation into an exchange program that sent human astronauts to another planet.
itunes:author: Coast to Coast AM
